buginformation.summary: add version option for the compiler
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem run java jar compiler jar version what the expected output what you see instead expected version statement actual error that version not supported what version the product are you using what operating system see above this compiler jar downloaded from this project didn build myself file dated 2009 windows please provide any additional information below this information doesn seem given anywhere don see help either this enhancement request not bug report there got some ant magic this build time the only reason not done because our ant skills are weak hrmmm yes ant can help here there buildnumber task that will increment number plain file the propertyfile task that can more sophisticated things example the latter attached which you can very nearly just drop into your existing build file more here http ant apache org manual optional tasks propertyfile html this issue was closed revision 440
